thread.section_title: US Service Animals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of US Service Animals | usserviceanimals.org
thread.title: Phyllis VanHoy
thread.title_full: US Service Animals reviewed by Phyllis VanHoy

author: Phyllis VanHoy
title: Phyllis VanHoy
text: I'll start by singling out one particular employee by the name of Angelique who was extremely helpful, friendly, and professional in her commitment to providing the best service to meet my needs while maintaining the integrity of her companies processes. The entire team that I spoke with on numerous occasions were exceptional. I would highly recommend that you contact the team at US Service Animals should you have a need to register your pet(s) in this category. They have licensed counselors on staff to assist with the certifications to ensure you and your pet meet the criteria.
